text: Lilo Pelekai (first name LEE-lo, last name Peh-leh-kai) is one of the two characters of the Disney animated movie Lilo & Stitch, its sequels, and the animated series. Lilo (literally, "lost" in Hawaiian, and also in Mandarin). Lilo is a young Hawaiian girl who lives on the island of Kauai with her older sister Nani and her new family of alien visitors that live on Earth. == References == Category:Animated human characters Category:Disney characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2002 Category:Lilo & Stitch
title: Lilo Pelekai
